articles.title: iPhone SOS-by-satellite service goes live in North America - New Zealand Herald
articles.description: Globalstar - Rocket Lab's largest customer - connects you in areas with no cell sites.
articles.content: Apple is using US satellite network provider Globalstar - which has emerged as Rocket Lab's largest single customer - for its new SOS service, for areas with no cellular or Wi-Fi coverage. Photo / Su… [+2014 chars]
